documents.document: @UnaMullally I've been listening to ABBA all day because of it, TBH. Great to hear Bitches Be Crazy getting the tribute it deserves, too 🙌🏻

Today's 'Yoga for Sport: Injury Prevention & Recovery' workshop in @theyogahub was like sending the ol' hips n' hamstrings in for a service🛠

@RichieMcCormack This is true. Martina Hingis' drop-shot was one of my earliest crushes 😍
Put the kettle on. We're in this for the long haul. #FedererNadal #AusOpen

@EmerTheScreamer Extra staff for opening day of Next sale,coz my sister worked there. Doors opened at 5AM. Have never really gotten over it.

@hazelcullen SRSLY though that is outrageous. Don't pay it. It's 2017. How have phone companies worldwide not figured this shit out yet?!
@hazelcullen I TOLD you to stop calling the goats 🙄
@etainkidney I feel I learn a lot more from Professional Tainer than I do @TainerBang. Except in life. @TainerBang has taught me about life.
